dialogue: Would you like to join our frequent victims club?
No, I just want to buy this beverage.
You could save a dollar if you join now. It only takes a minute.
I don't want you tracking my purchases and selling my data.
If you don't sign up, my colleagues and I will pester you to do it every time you try to buy something.
Because other stores are just as bad as we are.
Tell that to the customer survey I'm about to pester you into doing.
